title: Performance Resource Timing Event Data
description: Data payload for the performance.resource_timing event. Fired when resource loading performance metrics are captured via the Resource Timing API.

initiatorType.description: The type of element that initiated the resource fetch, e.g. script, img, css, fetch.

duration.description: The total time to load the resource in milliseconds.

transferSize.description: The size of the resource transfer in bytes.

startTime.description: The time at which the resource fetch started, relative to the page load, in milliseconds.
